attributes.action: Please bring back UK Troops from Iraq!!!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The UK has no real reasons to stay in Iraq, no weapons of mass destruction have been found and the oppressor Saddam Hussein is dead. So can you please tell me, what are the British still doing their? To benefit the people of Iraq or for UK monetary purposes, since the people of Iraq do not want the British in their Country. It is the British who are now oppressing the people of Iraq!!!
